content: this gorgeous rainbow love cowl is a light and airy cowl that can be worn in warmer weather it is made with a beautiful cotton blend yarn this pattern is one of the june contributions to the 2020 scarf of the month club > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 225 yds of category 4 medium yarn i used lion brand mandala ice cream cotton blend in the rainbow colorway * size i 5 5 mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
